title: Parkville
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Buildings, structures, etc
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Suburbs
description: A lyrical look at this small historical, Melbourne suburb. Parkville is characterised by Victorian mansions, terraced houses, cast iron, park railings and ivy-clad columns. Social life is carried on in the wide streets, parklands and pubs. An atmospheric film of beautiful images featuring background low-key guitar music. Made by the students of Swinburne with the assistance of the Parkville Association.
